donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF TRUST TERRITORY OF THE PAC
outputs.output_descr: This project was designed on the basis of validated and accepted recommendations of Palau Legislative Needs Assessment Report (LNA) report 2008. In 2009 a Special Committee was established by the Offices of the President of the Senate and Speaker of the House of Delegates to examine the recommendations and advice the Palau National Congress, or Olbiil Era Kelulau (OEK) on its implementation. Out of the 44 recommendations in the LNA Report the Special Committee had agreed that the Congress will implement 30 through the use of its resources and internal processes while UNDP will support the Congress formulate a project proposal and and together with the support of Palau National Congress mobilize additional resources to implement 14 (7,8,9,10,11,12,13,15,16,21,25,28,37,38)  recommendations since their implementation require financial and technical resources.  The project focuses on achieving the following outputs: (i) strengthening information technology, research capacity, public outreach and civic education; and capacity development for Congress staff; and (ii) supporting OEK members through training and provision of support resources such as Handbook for Members of the National Congress.
